info.name: Tender Coconut Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5 | Relish the refreshing and fresh bites of Tender Coconut, only in NIC's Tender Coconut. Kcal/serving: 143

info.name: Madagascar Chocolate Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5 | Extra rich & smooth Madagascar Ice Cream, takes chocolate indulgence to a level beyond description. Kcal/serving: 173

info.name: Cookies N Cream Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5 | Dedicated to lovers of cookies. A fun scoop of Oreo cookies in your Ice Cream. Kcal/serving: 167

info.name: Dryfruit Overload Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5 | A scoop of Ice Cream Loaded with Cashews, Almonds, Pistas and Kishmishs. Needs no further description. Kcal/serving: 172

info.name: Mixed Berries Ice Cream 750ml
info.description: Serves 7

info.name: Chocochips Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 7 | Melt in mouth chocolate chips in every spoon. Truly, a decadent ice cream experience. Kcal/serving: 204

info.name: Britannia Bourbon Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: NIC is happy to bring you its latest limited edition flavour in a special collaboration with Britannia Bourbon. Delicious bourbon chunks in rich chocolate ice cream. A must have if you love Bourbon and you love NIC Ice Creams - need we say more ?

info.name: Belgian Chocolate Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Kcal/serving: 178

info.name: Chocobite Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5 | A creamy blend of milk chocolate perfection with tantalizing chocolate chunks, offering an irresistible burst of chocolate goodness in every spoonful. Elevate your Ice cream experience with this decadent delight.

info.name: Velvety Nutella Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5 | Indulge in Creamy Bliss: Nutella Ice Cream Crafted with care, each scoop is a delightful balance of creamy dairy and Nutella's signature blend of cocoa and hazelnuts, creating a harmonious symphony of taste and texture. Whether enjoyed on its own or as a delightful complement to your favorite desserts, this ice cream promises a moment of pure indulgence.

info.name: Lychee Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: Serves 5

info.name: Madagascar Chocolate Ice Cream 750ml
info.description: Serves 7 | Kcal/serving: 173

info.name: Chocochips Ice Cream 750ml
info.description: Serves 7 | Kcal/serving: 204

info.name: Chocolate Duo
info.description: (2x500 ml tubs) Dive into the rich and luxurious flavors of Belgian Chocolate (500 ml) paired with Madagascar (500 ml). This combo is a perfect blend of deep chocolatey goodness creating a heavenly experience for your taste buds.

info.name: Tropical Bliss Trio
info.description: (1x500 ml tub and 2x100 ml Tubs) Experience the vibrant flavors of Mixed Berries (500 ml), Alphonso Mango (100 ml), and Tender Coconut (100 ml). This combo is a tropical paradise, perfect for those who love fruity and refreshing ice creams.

info.name: Exotic Duo
info.description: (2x500 ml tubs) Indulge in the unique and sophisticated flavors of Sitaphal (500 ml) and Tender Coconut (500 ml). This combo offers a delightful balance of sweet and savory, providing a truly exquisite ice cream experience.

info.name: Exotic Trio
info.description: (1x500 ml tub and 2x100 ml Tubs) Treat yourself to Strawberry Cheesecake (500 ml), Coffee Walnut (100 ml), and French Vanilla (100 ml). This combo brings together the rich, creamy, and refreshing flavors for a perfect dessert experience.

info.name: Ultimate 4
info.description: (4x100 ml tubs) Enjoy a quartet of flavors with Roasted Almond (100 ml), Alphonso Mango (100 ml), Mixed Berries (100 ml), and Belgian Chocolate (100 ml). This combo is a perfect choice for those who appreciate a variety of gourmet flavors in their ice cream.

info.name: Chococrunch Duo
info.description: Serves 5

info.name: Desert Gold Duo
info.description: Serves 1

info.name: Britannia Bourbon Ice Cream 500ml
info.description: NIC is happy to bring you its latest limited edition flavour in a special collaboration with Britannia Bourbon. Delicious bourbon chunks in rich chocolate ice cream. A must have if you love Bourbon and you love NIC Ice Creams - need we say more ?

info.name: Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Super fruity, tangy, sweet and incredibly creamy - Nic's strawberry cheesecake variant contains all the essentials for a perfect dessert experience. Kcal/serving: 174

info.name: Chikoo Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1

info.name: Coffee Walnut Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | A crunch of rich walnut blended with the fine taste of coffee in your Ice Cream. Kcal/serving: 172

info.name: French Vanilla Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Experience the bliss of pure vanilla beans extract in every bite of this Ice Cream. Kcal/serving: 151

info.name: Strawberry Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Kcal/serving: 132

info.name: Tender Coconut Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Relish the refreshing and fresh bites of Tender Coconut, only in NIC's Tender Coconut. Kcal/serving: 143

info.name: Sea Salt Caramel Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | A decadent swirl of Mediterranean sea salt & crunch of crispy pearls ice cream for a tantalizing combination of taste and texture. Kcal/serving: 179

info.name: Roasted Almond Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Roasted almonds is a must-have. Its crunchy texture with its singular flavour is unparalleled. Also available in sugarless. Kcal/serving: 172

info.name: Paan Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Dessert? Or Mouthfreshner? A delightfully tasty combination giving you the best of both. Kcal/serving: 153

info.name: Mixed Berries Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Crafted with imported Californian Cranberries, Blueberries and Strawberries. This ice cream is perfect to give you a berry rush! Kcal/serving: 153

info.name: Alphonso Mango 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Indulge in the luscious delight of NIC Alphonso Mango Ice Cream – a creamy fusion of velvety textures and the rich, tropical sweetness of premium Ratnagiri Alphonso mangoes, creating a taste of pure bliss. Perfect for savoring the essence of summer in every spoonful.

info.name: Madagascar 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Extra rich & smooth Madagascar Ice Cream, takes chocolate indulgence to a level beyond description. Kcal/serving: 173

info.name: Gulab Jamun Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Now India's favourite Gulab Jamun in ice cream. Lose yourself in its rich aroma & indulgent texture. Kcal/serving: 186

info.name: Dryfruit Overload Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | A scoop of Ice Cream Loaded with Cashews, Almonds, Pistas and Kishmishs. Needs no further description. Kcal/serving: 172

info.description: Serves 1 | Melt in mouth chocolate chips in every spoon. Truly, a decadent ice cream experience. Kcal/serving: 204

info.name: Apricot Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | Dive into the premium taste of Imported Apricot Ice Cream. Kcal/serving: 132

info.name: Anjeer Ice Cream 100ml

info.name: Sitaphal Ice Cream 100ml
info.description: Serves 1 | A tropical delight in a 100 ml tub. This one is hard to put down and made for every mood.
